scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd legacyClient && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd ../legacyClient && npm i
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "cd legacyClient && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd legacyClient && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run develop"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
